scripts.run-all-checks: npm run lint:scripts && npm run lint:styles && npm run type-check && vitest run && npm run test:e2e -- --reporter=dot
scripts.test:e2e: docker build -t snake-e2e -f Dockerfile.e2e . && docker run --rm -e CI=true snake-e2e
scripts.test:e2e:ui: docker build -t snake-e2e -f Dockerfile.e2e . && docker run --rm -it -p 8080:8080 snake-e2e npx playwright test --ui --ui-host=0.0.0.0 --ui-port=8080
scripts.test:e2e:update: docker build -t snake-e2e -f Dockerfile.e2e . && docker run --rm -v ./e2e:/app/e2e snake-e2e npx playwright test --update-snapshots --reporter=dot
